Question: This person performs with guitar, keyboards, and harmonica.
Hints: In May 2000, this person was awarded the Polar Music Prize.
While in London, this person performed at several London folk clubs, including The Troubadour, Les Cousins, and Bunjies.
The recording was taped at Brandeis University on May 10, 1963, two weeks prior to the release of The Freewheelin' this person.
